H0.text: What shape is the pasta known as ‘conchiglie’. Spiral

H1.text: What shape is the pasta known as ‘conchiglie’. Tube

H2.text: What shape is the pasta known as ‘conchiglie’. Flower

H3.text: What shape is the pasta known as ‘conchiglie’. Sea Shells

A4.text: The name derives from the Italian word for 'seashell', conchiglia.
